key_changes: Added import statement for TeamWorkloadPage component
Added new Route definition for /team-workload path
New page component created with Material-UI Box and Typography
Implements PageHeader component with breadcrumbs navigation
Phase changed from 'Team Workload View Page' to 'Routing and Navigation'

patterns_discovered.description: Consistent approach of importing page components and registering them as routes in App.tsx within a protected route group
patterns_discovered.significance: Establishes consistent routing architecture across the application

patterns_discovered.description: New page components follow a standard structure: Box wrapper with padding, PageHeader component with breadcrumbs, and placeholder content
patterns_discovered.significance: Enables rapid page scaffolding while maintaining UI consistency

patterns_discovered.description: Page created with 'coming soon' placeholder text, indicating incremental development approach
patterns_discovered.significance: Allows route functionality to be verified before full implementation

gotchas_discovered.gotcha: Route placement matters for protected routes
gotchas_discovered.description: The new /team-workload route was added within the ProtectedRoute wrapper, ensuring authentication is required - this is correct but could be missed if added outside
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Consistently place new routes within the protected route group unless explicitly public

gotchas_discovered.description: New imports must be added alongside existing page imports in App.tsx to maintain code organization
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Follow existing import pattern when adding new page imports

key_decisions: Created placeholder page component with standard Material-UI structure
Registered route within protected route group
Used consistent breadcrumb navigation pattern from existing pages
Added 'coming soon' message to indicate incomplete feature
success_factors: Followed existing component and routing patterns
Leveraged established PageHeader component for consistency
Single-pass implementation with no rework needed

recommendations.recommendation: Consider extracting route definitions to a separate configuration file for better maintainability as the number of routes grows
recommendations.rationale: App.tsx is becoming a routing hub; a routes configuration would improve organization

recommendations.recommendation: Create a template or snippet for page component generation to ensure consistent structure across new pages
recommendations.rationale: Pattern is consistent but codifying it would speed up future page creation

recommendations.recommendation: Add route navigation tests to verify /team-workload path is accessible and renders correctly
recommendations.rationale: Route registration should be validated with automated tests

recommendations.recommendation: Update route documentation/navigation map when the page implementation is completed
recommendations.rationale: Placeholder content should be tracked as a work-in-progress item
